    • 方法详细资料

      • rand

        public static int rand(int min,
                       int max)
        Randomly generate a number in the min and Max range
        参数:
        min - min value
        max - max value
        返回:
        return random int number

      • rand

        public static String rand(int size)
        Generate a number of numeric strings randomly
        参数:
        size - string count
        返回:
        return random string value

      • isNotBlank

        public static boolean isNotBlank(String... str)
        Determine whether a list of string is not blank
        参数:
        str - a list of string value
        返回:
        return any one in this list of string is not blank

      • isNotBlankThen

        public static void isNotBlankThen(String str,
                                  Consumer<String> consumer)
        Execute consumer when the string is not empty
        参数:
        str - string value
        consumer - consumer

      • isBlankThen

        public static void isBlankThen(String str,
                               Consumer<String> consumer)
        Execute consumer when the string is empty
        参数:
        str - string value
        consumer - consumer

      • notBankAccept

        public static <R> void notBankAccept(String str,
                                     Function<String,R> function,
                                     Consumer<R> consumer)
        we can replace ` if（StringUtils.isNotBlank(str)） { Integer i = Integer.parseInt (str) demo.setAge(i) } ` with ` notBankAccept ("2", Integer::parseInt, route::setSort) `
        参数:
        str - string value
        consumer - consumer
        function - format

      • notBankThen

        public static void notBankThen(String str,
                               Runnable action)
        Execute action when String is not empty
        参数:
        str - String value
        action - action

      • noNullElseGet

        public static <T> T noNullElseGet(@NonNull
                                  Supplier<T> s1,
                                  @NonNull
                                  Supplier<T> s2)
        we can replace if（doMethod1()!= null） { return doMethod1() } else { return doMethod2() } with return notBlankElse(bar::getName, bar::getNickName)
        参数:
        s1 - Supplier
        s2 - Supplier

      • isBlank

        public static boolean isBlank(String str)

        参数:

        返回:
        return string is blank

        public static String alignLeft(Object o,
                               int width,
                               char c)

        参数:
        o - objects that can be to String
        width - number of characters
        c - characters
        返回:
        new characters
